project.description:
'bundle1' exports package 'bundle1'. 'bundle1.fragment' adds an additional class to the same package. 'bundle2' imports that class (it uses a p2.inf to make sure the fragment is required).
This test asserts that the exported package of 'bundle1' is added as a classpath inclusion for 'bundle1.fragment', so that 'bundle2' can access it.
Bug 572518 - Tycho 2.3.0 cannot import class exported from other bundle's fragment (p2.inf + Eclipse-ExtensibleAPI: true)
